name: Armadillon
description:
This game was made in 48h as part of TiTeGameJamIX by: Toni Hannula, Heikki Raussi and Vilhelmina Hallikainen.

Armadillon is a thirdperson collecthaton-type game where you play as an armadillo (actually pangolin, but whatever) who finds it's home covered in human trash and decides to move. First, it will need to find some ants to snack on though.

Controls - KB, Xbox:

  • Move: WASD, LS
  • Jump: Space, A
  • Roll Mode Toggle: SHIFT, B
  • Tongue: L-CTRL, X
